full_summary:
### Request for Proposal: Janitorial Services - SUMMERLAND Research and Development Centre
#### Canadian Government Tender Announcement
Tender Reference: cb-7423-12145636

### Background
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada's SUMMERLAND Research and Development Centre located in Summerland, British Columbia requires a contractor to provide janitorial services.

### Notice Details

- **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
- **Notice Issuance Date:** July 20, 2023
- **Notice Cancellation Date:** August 29, 2023

### Contract Scope
The successful contractor will be required to provide janitorial services on a one-year basis, with an option to extend for four additional one-year periods.

### Security Requirements
Personnel requiring access to sensitive worksites must hold a valid RELIABILITY STATUS granted or approved by Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada.

### Mandatory Site Visit
A site visit is mandatory for all bidders. The visit is scheduled for August 8, 2023 at 10:00 am (PDT) at the SUMMERLAND Research and Development Centre. Bidders must communicate with the Site Authority to confirm attendance and provide the name(s) of the person(s) attending.

### Evaluation Criteria
Bids will be evaluated based on the entire requirement of the bid solicitation, including the technical and financial evaluation criteria.

### Contract Award
The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for contract award.

### Tender Documents
The tender solicitation documents can be accessed via [canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).

### Indigenous Business Priority
Having a business profile in the Indigenous Business Directory will increase a company’s visibility and competitiveness in bid solicitations for Indigenous businesses.

### Contact Information
Contact Natalie O’Neill, Contracting Specialist at Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada for further information or concerns.
